Posts.EditableText: What is the best way to make passive skills and active skills?
Posts.HTML: What is the best way to make passive skills and active skills?

Posts.EditableText: Too vague. In what context? Is this for a combat system? A passive skill could be as simple as just adding 'x' amount to a stat and having the reason why be listed somewhere; 'Strength Training - +1 strength (permanent).
